title: Club can print Addendum A of contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has created a new non-first year contract
custom_steps:
WHEN user fills out an Addendum A
AND user clicks 'print'
custom_expected:
THEN Addendum A should generate and print as it was entered into EBIS
AND all behavior listed in the Report Details should be met
AND the layout follows the template
AND fields not yet filled out should print blank

title: Club can print Addendum C of contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has created a new non-first year contract
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks 'print'
custom_expected:
THEN Addendum C should generate and print as it was entered into EBIS
AND data appears as it was entered into EBIS
AND the layout and behavior follow the template and report details
AND any fields not filled out should print blank
AND Add C prints on its own page
AND fits on one page

title: Club can print Addendums E, F, G, H
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has created a new non-first year contract
custom_steps:
WHEN user enters an Addendum E, F, G, and H
AND clicks 'print'
custom_expected:
THEN Addendum E, F, G, and H should generate and print as it was entered into EBIS
AND data appears as it was entered into EBIS
AND the layout and behavior follow the template and report details
AND any fields not filled out should print blank

title: As BOC I want to see which users submitted and approved Addendum Cs, even when e-signed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND that club has two or more tendered add Cs
AND today's date is within the auto-approval date window in System Dates
custom_steps:
1. WHEN user e-signs and auto approves an Add C

1. WHEN user uploads a .pdf and manually submits an Add C
AND logs in and BOC and approves the Add C
custom_expected:
1. THEN the Date submitted field in the Status and Dates section of the Add C should show user as club who stamped it
AND the 'Approved by' field should show "Auto-approved"

2. THEN show club user name that submitted it
AND show the BOC user name that approved it

title: As BOC I want players contract to get terminated when he is released
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player has an MNC
custom_steps: WHEN the user releases him
custom_expected:
THEN contract is terminated
AND updated with comments/timestamps
AND Add C no longer count for the player but remain approved

title: As BOC I want players contract to expire when he becomes Free Agent
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player has an MNC
custom_steps: WHEN the player becomes a FA
custom_expected:
THEN contract is expired
AND updated with comments/timestamps
AND Add C's no longer count but remain approved

title: As BOC I want to approve the contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has created a new contract
AND has filled out all required fields
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Approve
custom_expected:
THEN contract is Approved
AND contract history is updated along with Status and Dates fields
AND contract reloads in view mode but still entirely editable by BOC
AND blue notification appears

title: As BOC I want to see required field errors when I approve a contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is creating a contract
AND the contract contains errors
custom_steps: WHEN the user approves the contract
custom_expected:
THEN errors appear global modal
AND after dismissing modal, errors are pinned to the right
AND fields containing errors are outlined in red

title: As BOC I want to view hard errors when I approve a contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is creating a contract
AND the contract contains hard errors
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks approve
custom_expected:
THEN show error modal
AND after error modal is dismissed, errors are pinned to the right
AND required fields are outlined in red

title: As BOC I want to view Overridable errors when I approve a contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has a contract w/overridable errors
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks approve
custom_expected:
THEN show error modal
AND after modal is dismissed, errors are pinned to the right
AND missing required fields are outlined in red

title: As BOC I want to view Add C warnings when I approve a contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is creating a contract but has not filled out Add Cs
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks approve
custom_expected:
THEN show error modal
AND errors pin to the right
AND required field outlined in red

title: As BOC I want to see pre approve ID
custom_preconds: GIVEN contract has a pre approver
custom_steps: WHEN the user approves the contract
custom_expected: THEN show pre approver in Approved by field

title: As BOC I want players status to be active when I approve his contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is creating a contract for a non-active player
custom_steps: WHEN the user approves the contract
custom_expected:
THEN player's header is updated with status/logo/club/level of play
AND player appears in MN roster widget and counts towards active/under control limit
AND player info appears in green in roster widget
AND entry in profile appears in black
AND contract date updated

title: As BOC, I want to send a Terms Accepted Contract back to the club for updates
custom_steps: WHEN contract is in Terms Accepted state and BOC selects "Return to Club",
custom_expected:
THEN move the contract state to "Update Terms Accepted"
AND make no changes to player's transactions or roster status
AND contract continues to stay visible to all other clubs (except comments and attachments)
AND show updated buttons in new state as per button table
AND show blue notification "Contract is now Update Terms Accepted"
AND no rule checks run

title: As BOC, I want to send a Pre-approved Contract back to the club for updates
custom_steps: WHEN contract is moved from Pre-approved to Update Terms Accepted
custom_expected: THEN all conditions from [C166720](http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/166720&group_by=cases:section_id&group_order=asc&group_id=21642) are met

title: As BOC I want player taken off roster if his contract is rejected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User has created a contract and is at Terms Accepted
AND User is logged in as BOC
custom_steps:
WHEN User goes to a Terms Accepted Contract
AND User rejects a Terms Accepted contract
custom_expected:
THEN Overrideable warning appears that states the transactions will be reversed
AND Update the state of contract
AND Reverse all transactions up to that state
AND all player transactions are now hidden involving Contract
AND Player history entry now has rejected next to contract signing
AND Players roster status and club returns to prior signing

title: As BOC I want to reject a TA Contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a TA contract submitted to BOC
custom_steps: WHEN the user rejects the contract
custom_expected:
THEN status/header/date is updated
AND contract is removed from clipboard
AND profile entry updated and in black
AND contract reloads in view mode
AND blue notification populates
AND contract is still fully editable to BOC
AND contract is visible to other clubs except attachments/comments

title: As BOC I want to reject a Pre Approved contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has a submitted pre approved contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user rejects the contract
custom_expected:
THEN status/header/date is updated
AND contract is removed from clipboard
AND profile entry updated and in black
AND contract reloads in view mode
AND blue notification populates
AND contract is still fully editable to BOC
AND contract is visible to other clubs except attachments/comments

title: As BOC I want to enter details on why contract was rejected
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is entering reasons for rejecting a contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user rejects the contract
custom_expected: THEN show comments: Contract rejected on [date of state change]. Reason: [Value from Reason Dropdown]. Comment : [Value from Comment dropdown]

title: As BOC I can delete a rejected or withdrawn contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is viewing a rejected/withdrawn contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the delete button
custom_expected:
THEN show confirmation message
AND entry is removed from history

title: As BOC I want to withdraw a TA contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is viewing a TA contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user moves the contract to a withdrawn state
custom_expected:
THEN show blue notification
AND history entry is updated
AND contract's status/comments/date is updated

title: As BOC I want to void a contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as BOC
and I am viewing an approved contract
custom_steps:
WHEN I click on Void button
AND I enter reason/comments for voiding
(AND I override warnings/errors if there are any)
custom_expected:
THen the contract status updates to Voided
AND the last updated by/time updates
AND contract reloads in view mode

title: As BOC I want to enter reasons for voiding a contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has an approved contract
AND has entered reason for voiding the contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks void
custom_expected:
THEN contract reloads in view mode w/updated status/date
AND show blue notification
AND contract is still fully editable by BOC
AND populate comments w/fields filled out by user for reasons to void

title: As BOC I want player taken off roster if i withdraw his contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has created a contract for a player that recently got him onto a roster
custom_steps: WHEN the user withdraws that contract
custom_expected:
THEN player no longer appears in the roster
AND entry/status/date is updated

title: As BOC I want to withdraw a pre approved contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has a pre approved contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user withdraws the contract
custom_expected:
THEN show blue notification
AND entry/status/date/comment is updated

title: As BOC I want all txs that occured since contract signing to get reversed on voiding contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has an approved contract
AND approved tx after the contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user voids the contract
custom_expected:
THEN show error
AND all tx are reversed
AND entry/comment/date/status is updated

title: As club, I can update a contract in Update Terms Accepted State
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a club
and have located an Update TA contract
custom_steps: WHEN I click edit button
custom_expected:
THEN I am able to fully edit the contract
AND I can change or add attached files
AND I cannot delete contract

title: As Club I want to submit an Update TA back to BOC
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has a contract sent back for updates from BOC
custom_steps: WHEN the clicks submit
custom_expected:
THEN Contract reloads with updated status in view mode
AND Status header updates
AND Status and Dates section updates "Status Last Changed" and "Changed by " fields
AND Show blue notification "Contract submitted successfully"
AND contract goes back to BOC clipboard

title: As club I want to view required field errors when I resubmit a Update TA Contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a club
AND I navigate to a contract that is Update Terms Accepted Status
custom_steps: WHEN I edit and try to resubmit this contract
custom_expected: THEN [linked story] errors will fire

title: As Club I want to view hard errors when I resubmit a contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has a contract w/hard errors that has been sent back
custom_steps: WHEN the user resubmits the contract
custom_expected:
THEN show error modal
AND errors are pinned to the right
AND required fields outlined in red

title: As Club I want an action item if a TA contract was sent back
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has submitted a contract to BOC
AND BOC has sent the contract back for updating
custom_steps: WHEN the user views their action item widget
custom_expected:
THEN action item is populated and remains until resubmitted
AND links work

title: As Club I want notification when my contract is approved
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as BOC
And have approved a contract for [Club]
custom_steps:
WHen I login as [Club]
AND I view my notifications clipboard
custom_expected:
THEN there is a notification with the following
- Type = Minor Contracts
- Populate Org column (3 letter abbreviation only) and Player column (Roster name)
- Description = Minor League Contract Approved
AND the link takes you to the minor contract

title: As Club I want to view overridable warnings when I resubmit contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has a contract that has been sent back for update
AND it contains overrideable warnings
custom_steps: WHEN the user resubmits the contract
custom_expected:
THEN show error modal
AND errors are pinned to the right
AND required fields are outlined in red

title: As Club I want to view Add C Errors and warnings when I resubmit contrct
custom_preconds:
GIVEN users contract has been sent back for update
AND it contains Add C errors
custom_steps: WHEN the user resubmits the contract
custom_expected:
THEN show error modal
AND errors are pinned to the right
AND required filed outlined in red

title: As club I want to see if esign passed of failed
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is in a single C form
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks submit
custom_expected:
THEN user is taken to esig status screen
IF submission is unsuccessful
THEN show error

title: As Club I want to print Add C of the contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has filled out an Add C form
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks print
custom_expected:
THEN Addendum C is generated along with any other part of the contract that has been implemented
AND All behavior listed in Report Details for Addendum C should be met
AND Data on printed Addendum C should match with what was entered into EBIS
AND Any fields not yet filled out in ebis should just print blank on the PDF
AND ADD C fits one page separately
AND Add C follows template
AND Any changes made to the contract by club/BOC any state should reflect the changes in the PDF when you hit PRINT again
IF Spanish THEN separate page printed

title: As Club I want to see progress bar when submitting Add Cs or contracts
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is creating an Add C or contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user bulk submits
custom_expected:
THEN show a progress bar that updates real time, that tells the user how many records have been processed
AND Modal cannot be dismissed
AND This logic should apply to all bulk state change and save actions on Multi C widget (both club and BOC), state change actions on approvals clipboard and approval + stamping action on the MNC verification widget, and club stamping widget
AND show results dialogue box (typically the error message modal)
IF club or BOC stamping fails for any particular form, THEN show error using standard error messaging dialogue for the appropriate players -  "[Addendum C/ Contract] could not be stamped. Please contact BOC"

title: As Club I want to add auth signatories from add C or contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in an Add C or contract form
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks 'new' next to authorized signatory field
custom_expected:
THEN open a lightbox to add a new signatory or update permissions similar to the functionality on transactions
AND Signatory should also appear on the signatory widget where user can store a signature

title: As Club I want to print Add Cs twice as fast
As BOC I want to approve a single contract from MNC Ver Widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is on the MNC verification widget
AND it contains a contract ready for approval
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the contract
AND clicks approve
custom_expected:
THEN contract status/date/entry is updated
AND contract is dropped from the widget

title: As BOC I want to approve multiple contracts from MNC Ver Wdget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is on the MNC verification widget
AND there are multiple contracts ready for approval
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects multiple contracts
AND clicks approve
custom_expected:
THEN contract's status/entry/date is updated
AND contracts are removed from the widget

title: As BOC I want to see all pending contracts in MNC Verification Widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN there are pending contracts in the system
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the MNC verification widget
custom_expected:
THEN all pending contracts are visible
AND follow AC and wireframe

title: As BOC I want to see MJ Base salary on this widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has navigated to the MNC verification widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the salary column
custom_expected: THEN show P2 OR ML base salary

title: As a user I want to search for non 1st year contracts by signing date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is in adv search
AND there are non-first year contracts in the system
custom_steps: WHEN the user filters by signing date
custom_expected: THEN contracts load properly according to AC

title: As a user I want to search for contracts containing specific addendums
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user in adv search
AND there are non-first year contracts in the system
custom_steps:
WHEN they use addendum contained as a filter
AND type in an addendum contained in a contract
custom_expected: THEN contracts populate according to AC and wireframe

title: As a user I want to search for Add F's by state
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is in adv search
AND there are non-first year contracts in the system
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the Add F as a filter
custom_expected: THEN contracts load according to AC and wireframe

title: As a user I want to search for contracts by status
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is in adv search
AND there are non-first year contracts in the system
custom_steps: WHEN the user uses status as a filter
custom_expected: THEN load contracts according to AC and wireframe

title: As a user I want to Search by signing Club
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in adv search
AND there are non-first year contracts in the system
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the signing club as a filter
custom_expected: THEN contracts load according to AC and wireframe

title: As a user I want to Search by Player name
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is in adv search
AND there are non-first year contracts in the system
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the player name as a filter
custom_expected: THEN contracts load according to AC and wireframe

title: As a user I want to Search By Approval Date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is in adv search
AND there are non-first year contracts in the system
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects approval date as their filter
custom_expected: THEN contracts load according to AC and wireframe

title: As a user I want to Search Successor Contracts
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in adv search
AND there are non-first year contracts in the system
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects successor contracts as a filter
custom_expected: THEN contracts load according to AC and wireframe

title: As a user I want to Search contracts by term
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in adv search
AND there are non-first year contracts in the system
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects Term as a filter
custom_expected: THEN contracts load according to AC and wireframe

title: As a user I want to search add Cs by attachment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is in adv search
AND there are non-first year contracts in the system
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects Add C>attachment
custom_expected: THEN contracts load according to AC and wireframe

title: As a user I want to draft information on domestic pro profiles
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has navigated to a domestic pro profile
custom_steps: WHEN the user goes to their draft/scouting tab
custom_expected: THEN info is accurate and read only and follows wireframe

title: As user I want to search for contracts containing specific Add B Clause
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in adv search
AND there are non-first year contracts in the system
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects Add B>Clause as a filter
custom_expected: THEN contracts load according to AC and wireframe

title: As user I want to be warned if my add c salary is >35K
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as BOC
AND have located a player who does not have an active MJ Contract for current year
custom_steps: WHEN I enter an Add C salary of over 35K for this player
custom_expected:
THEN show warning for club/BOC on submit
"Please contact the Commissioner’s Office regarding this player’s contract"

title: As user I want to see national ID #s in ebis 2
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on a pro player profile
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the info tab
custom_expected:
THEN national ID is populated for users who had it in ebis1
AND NOT required for all players but if selected must be filled out
AND follows DD and wireframe

title: As club/BOC, I want to see ebis 1 contracts in Ebis 2 Contract History in the new states
custom_preconds: GIVEN user in a player's contract history
custom_expected:
THEN all non-1st year contracts entries that are viewable in ebis1 should appear in EBIS2
AND When contracts are brought over, they should be converted to the following states:
Preliminary > Preliminary
Submit to Club > Preliminary
Submit Terms > Terms Submitted
Terms Accepted > Terms Accepted
Reject Terms > Preliminary
Pre-approved > Pre-approved
Reject Accepted > Rejected
Withdrawn > Withdrawn
Approved > Approved
Update Approved > Approved
Expired > Expired
Terminated > Terminated
Voided > Voided
